text: Miklós Jancsó (27 September 192131 January 2014) was a Hungarian movie director and screenwriter. Jancsó became famous during the mid-1960s. His famous works were The Round Up (Szegénylegények, 1965), The Red and the White (Csillagosok, katonák, 1967) and Red Psalm (Még kér a nép, 1971). Jancsó died on 31 January 2014, aged 92.Meghalt Jancsó Miklós ==References== ==Other websites== * *Jancsó's biography at Hungary.hu * * Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Hungarian movie directors Category:Hungarian screenwriters
title: Miklós Jancsó
